pages.text: Tomara salatera prati yatnabana habe [1], bisesata madhyabarti salatera [2] ebam allah‌ra uddesye tomara damrabe binitabhabe

atahpara tomara yadi bipadasanka kara, tabe pathacari athaba arohi abasthaya salata adaya karabe [1]. Atahpara tomara yakhana nirapada bodha kara takhana allah‌ke smarana karabe, jebhabe tini tamadera siksa diyechena, ya tomara janate na

Ara tomadera madhye jara mara yabe ebam stri rekhe yabe, tara yena tadera strike tadera ghara theke bera na kare tadera eka bacharera bharana-posanera asiyata kare [1]. Kintu yadi tara bera haye yaya, tabe bidhimata nijedera mata tara ya karabe tate tomadera kono papa ne'i. Ara allah‌ prabala parakranta, prajnamaya
Ara talakaprapta naridera prathamata bharana-posana kara muttakidera kartabya
Ebhabe allah‌ tamra ayatasamuha spastabhabe barnana karena yate tomara bujhate para

Apani ki tadera dekhena ni yara mrtyubhaye hajare hajare sbiya abasabhumi parityaga karechila[1]? Atahpara allah‌ taderake balechilena, ‘tomara mare ya'o’. Tarapara allah‌ taderake jibita karechilena. Niscaya'i allah‌ manusera prati anugrahasila; kintu adhikansa loka krtajnata prakasa kare na
Ara tomara allah‌ra pathe yud'dha kara ebam jene rakha, niscaya'i allah‌ sarbasrota, sarbajna
Ke se, ye allah‌ke kar‌ye hasana pradana karabe? Tini tara jan'ya ta bahugune brd'dhi karabena [1.] Ara allah‌ sankucita o samprasarita karena ebam tamra dike'i tomaderake pratyabartita kara habe
